title: Catch the action of ‘The French Open – Roland-Garros 2022’
body_lines: All tennis fans in Sri Lanka have the opportunity to watch the much-anticipated action of the 126th French open grand slam LIVE on Dialog Television and on the Dialog ViU App.The French Open is one of tennis’ biggest events globally and currently the tournament is ongoing at the world-famous Stade Roland Garros courts located in Paris. The tournament will go on till 5th June.
Novak Djokovic is the current champion for men’s singles, while Barbora Krejčíková holds the championship for women’s singles. Both will be defending their titles in the tournament this year as well.

Dialog Television is telecasting extensive coverage of this year’s French Open on Sony TEN 2 SD and HD, and Sony Six SD and HD, providing viewers with the option to watch much-loved tennis action in High Definition as well. Viewers can easily activate the channels via SMS, MyDialog App or missed call option. More details on channel activation can be accessed via Dialog. Lk.

Any Dialog Mobile Smartphone user can watch the entire tournament on the Dialog ViU App by subscribing to the Dialog ViU App Sports Pack. The Dialog ViU App allows its users to enjoy their favourite TV channels and programs on the go at any time, from anywhere without any data charges on the Dialog network. Any Dialog Television viewer can also download the ViU app and register their Dialog Television account to enjoy all the channels they have subscribed to without any additional charges or data charges on the Dialog network.
